title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager
description: - to be included into the TW core
name: Palette Manager - Preview
author: Mario Pietsch
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/history","text":"V 0.2.0 - 2022.11.16 * Docs refactoring and improvements * Cherrypick changes from master vanilla/base CSS * remove second search tab * add `@@highlighted text@@` preview V 0.1.0 - 2022.11.02 * New EditColourWidget ** New docs and examples for EditColourWidget * New "colour-picker-resolved Macro" ** New docs and examples for "colour-picker-resolved Macro" ** The macro and the widget belong together ** The macro is responsible to "resolve" different color-mode macros V 0.0.4 - 2022.09.04 * add search to palette manager * add search-terms to preview tiddlers * add focus button to preview heading for easier search grouping. It uses the first search-term element * palette manager is now a scrollable, to avoid jumpy scroll behaviour on search * < {{||$:/core/ui/AlertTemplate}} "},"$:/palettes/preview/background":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/background","caption":"Background","created":"20220824120108043","modified":"20220907192803123","search-term":"background general","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [[$:/PaletteManager]] \define xx() <$let colourName="foreground"> <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/palette}} > <> \end {{$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/background}} |Usually goes with "{{$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/foreground}}" |<> | "},"$:/palettes/preview/blockquote-bar":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/blockquote-bar","caption":"Blockquote","created":"20220824120314274","modified":"20220902164458383","search-term":"blockquote bar","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<<< some text some more text <<< "},"$:/palettes/preview/button-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/button-foreground","caption":"Button","created":"20220824121449584","modified":"20220902165107323","search-term":"button background border foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define config-title() $:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$let tv-config-toolbar-icons="yes" tv-config-toolbar-text="yes" tv-config-toolbar-class="" preview-button="$:/core/ui/Buttons/palette">

Take a sad song and make it better. Remember to let her into your heart Then you can start to make it better." dest="Hey Jude, don't be afraid. You were made to go out and get her. The minute you let her under your skin. Then you begin to make it better. show CSS code ``` .tc-sidebar-header { color: <>; fill: <>; } .tc-sidebar-header .tc-missing-tiddler-label { color: <>; } .tc-table-of-contents button { color: <>; } .tc-table-of-contents svg { width: 0.7em; height: 0.7em; vertical-align: middle; fill: <>; } ```

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/bold}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/italic}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/quote}}
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-selected">{{$:/core/images/options-button}}
"},"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-editor-fields-odd":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-editor-fields-odd","caption":"Tiddler Editor Fields","created":"20220825124849856","modified":"20220902211014375","search-term":"tiddler editor background border image fields even odd","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"tc-tiddler-edit-frame

.tc-tiddler-help a.tc-tiddlylink { color: <>; } .tc-import-table .tc-row-disabled { background: <>10; opacity: 0.8; } ``` "},"$:/palettes/preview/wikilist-url":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/wikilist-url","caption":"Wikilist","created":"20220825150217084","modified":"20220826143643298","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"''TODO -- Don't know them''"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/readme","text":"! License !! Be aware of the license, which will be changed [[$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/license]] !! Video Youtube will start collecting user-info, if you play the video! !! Feedback Feedback will be welcome at: [[to get feedback at Talk-TiddlyWiki|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/palette-manager-feature-complete-preview/5095]] ! Overview This plugin is an ''preview'' plugin, that should be implemented into the TW core in the future. * You can open it using the [[$:/PaletteManager]] ... where the previews look a bit different as if you open it with the * $:/ControlPanel --> Appearence --> Palette -> show editor button ! Important This plugin ''at the moment'' overwrites or adds the following system tiddlers: |Shadow Tiddler |Reason to change it atm |h |$:/PaletteManager |This is needed to get the new UI as shown in the image below | |$:/PaletteManager/preview |contains the whole preview code, which is `\import`ed to $:/PaletteManager | |$:/core/macros/colour-picker-resolved |This macro is used by the $:/PaletteManager to show resolved colours| |$:/_tw5.com-styles |This is needed to test the "Big Download Button" settings | |$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base |Changes here are needed so that some colour settings take effect, which isn't the case with the default setting in the core at the moment | The full list of plugin tiddlers can be seen at: $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager -> content tab "},"$:/core/macros/colour-picker-resolved":{"title":"$:/core/macros/colour-picker-resolved","created":"20221003090255582","modified":"20221109105649733","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" name="state" value={{{ [[$:/state/palettemanager/]addsuffixaddsuffix[/]addsuffix] }}}> <$wikify name="newColourName" text="""<$macrocall $name="resolve-colour" macrocall={{{ [getindex] }}}/>"""> \end \define delete-colour-index-actions() <$action-setfield $index=<>/> \define reset-colour-index-actions() <$action-setfield $index=<> $value={{{ [{!!origin}getindex] }}} /> \end \define palette-manager-colour-row-segment() \import [[$:/snippets/currpalettepreview]] \whitespace trim <$edit-text index=<> tag="input" type="text" placeholder=<> default="" class="tc-palette-manager-text-input"/>
<$macrocall $name="colour-picker-resolved" palette=<> colourName=<> class="tc-palette-manager-colour-input" /> <$let originColour={{{ [{!!origin}getindex] }}} currentColour={{{ [all[current]getindex] }}} resetDisabled={{{ [all[current]!has[origin]then[yes]] :else[matchthen[yes]else[no]] }}} > <$button tooltip={{{ [{$:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/Editor/Reset/Caption}addsuffix[ to: ]addsuffix] }}} aria-label={{$:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/Editor/Reset/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<> disabled=<> > {{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} <$list filter="[match[no]]" variable="ignore"> <$let currentTiddler={{!!origin}} colour=<> >

\end \define countResults() <$let colorList={{{ [{$:/state/palettemanager/showexternal}] :cascade[append] }}} counter={{{[subfiltercount[]]}}}> <> \end \define cloneActions() <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/palettes/]addsuffix] }}} $template={{$:/palette}} origin={{$:/palette}} name={{{ [{$:/palette}get[name]addsuffix] }}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<>/> \end \define clearSearch() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/search-term"/> \end \define open-tiddler-in-window() <$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> Open the Palette Manager in a new Window \end \define activateTiddlerWindow() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/PaletteManager" windowTitle="Palette Editor -- Side by Side View" width="800" height="600" /> \end \whitespace trim <$set name="currentTiddler" value={{$:/palette}}> <>: <$link to={{$:/palette}} class="tc-small-gap-left"> <$text text={{{ [all[current]get[name]] }}}/> <$text text={{{ [all[current]get[description]] }}}/> <$list filter="[all[current]is[shadow]is[tiddler]]" variable="listItem"> ''<>'' <$button class="tc-small-gap-left" message="tm-delete-tiddler" param={{$:/palette}}> <>
<$button actions=<> > <> <$text text={{{ [all[current]get[name]] }}}/> Origin: <$link class="tc-small-gap" to={{!!origin}}> <$let tv-wikilinks="no"> {{!!origin}} <$list filter="[{!!origin}is[shadow]is[tiddler]]" variable="listItem"> ''<>'' <$list filter="[all[current]is[shadow]!is[tiddler]]" variable="listItem"> ''<>'' <$checkbox \end <>"},"$:/snippets/currpalettepreview":{"title":"$:/snippets/currpalettepreview","created":"20220907172300686","modified":"20220909102505354","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim \define resolve-colour(macrocall) \import $:/core/macros/utils \whitespace trim <$wikify name="name" text="""$macrocall$"""> <> \end \define swatchStyle() background-color: $(swatchColour)$; \end \define swatch-inner() \whitespace trim <$set name="swatchColour" value={{##$(colourResolved)$}}> <$list filter="[!prefix[<>]]" variable="ignore">
> title=<<$(__x__)$>> /> <$list filter="[prefix[<>]]" variable="ignore"> <$wikify name="colourResolved" text="<$macrocall $name='resolve-colour' macrocall=<>/>"> <> \end \define swatch(x:swatchTitle) \whitespace trim <$set name="swatchColour" value={{##$(colour)$}}> <$set name="swatchTitle" value=<>> <$list filter="[!prefix[<>]]" variable="ignore">
> title=<<$x$>>/> <$list filter="[prefix[<>]]" variable="ignore"> <$wikify name="colourResolved" text="<$macrocall $name='resolve-colour' macrocall=<>/>"> <> \end \define getMessage(text) Do you wish to --$text$-- this palette? \define getTooltip(text) $text$ this palette \define handle-palette-button(text) \whitespace trim <$list filter="[{$:/state/ShowPaletteEditor}match[yes]]" variable=ignore> <$list filter="[all[current]is[tiddler]]" variable=ignore> <$button class="tc-handle-palette-button tc-btn-invisible tc-float-right" tooltip=<> > <$action-confirm $message=<> > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[<__text__>match[reset]then[$:/core/images/refresh-button]else[$:/core/images/delete-button]]" variable="button"> <$transclude tiddler=<
